name: hermit ogre
dieMessage: a hermit @c-bold-on@@c-magenta@ogre@c-reset@ groans as it dies an agonizing death.

attackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ swings a massive wooden club at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ is seething with anger at @player-name@'s intrusion into his territory. The @npc-color-name@ hurls a massive boulder at @player-name@!
The @npc-color-name@ emits a deep growl that can be heard echoing across the forest before swinging his wooden club downward at @player-name@!

criticalAttackMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ inhales deeply and then swings at @player-name@ with all its might, @c-yellow@CRACKING@c-reset@ several of @player-name@'s bones as the massive wooden club makes contact!

The @npc-color-name@, fueled by pure anger, goes into a complete rampage as it charges toward @player-name@, @c-red@SMASHING@c-reset@ into @player-name@'s torso with a massive wooden club in a stabbing motion!

battleMessages.message: The @npc-color-name@ swings a massive wooden club at @player-name@!

idleMessages.message: A @npc-color-name@ trudges around the boggy forest, searching for small game and foraging for food.
